block.p: WAL-MART STORES INC., Bentonville, Ark., said a unit, McLane Co., which provides distribution services, had entered a five-year wholesale supply agreement with the Chevron Corp., San Francisco, under which McLane will distribute food and nonfood products to Chevron's 700 company-operated stores. Financial terms were not disclosed.

WAL-MART STORES INC., Bentonville, Ark., said a unit, McLane Co., which provides distribution services, had entered a five-year wholesale supply agreement with the Chevron Corp., San Francisco, under which McLane will distribute food and nonfood products to Chevron's 700 company-operated stores. Financial terms were not disclosed.

INNOVATIVE CLINICAL SOLUTIONS LTD., Providence, R.I., which helps biopharmaceutical companies bring their drugs to market, filed its plan of reorganization under Chapter 11 of the federal bankruptcy law.
